/**
 * \page page_copychunks Copy data chunks
 *
 * Implements an example program to copy data chunks from one DAT file to
 * another one.
 * Remember to run this example on windows the streaming lib dll must be in your
 * path!
 * 
 * \par Location
 * \code
 *    ./examples/copychunks/
 * \endcode
 *
 * \par This example shows:
 * \li how to copy chunks
 * 
 * \par The implementation for "CopyChunks"
 * \include copychunks.cpp
 *
 */
